sub_title: Global Head of Sales Support Tools & Solutions
summary:
Specialties: with 10+ years of experience as a coordinating supporter in hospitality, I describe myself as a professional, who monitors the quality and ensures that everything is prepared, according to plan and worked out in detail. I ensure the quality and timelines of the output of the team. I am a realistic and practical organizer, strong in the conversion of plans and strategies into concrete tasks and activities with great capacity for follow-through and attention to detail. I am accurate, consequent and disciplined and take matters in a systematic and conscientious way. I am known for my patience and ability to adapt to the requirements of its environment. I am very customer and service oriented and look for relationships that are focused on growth and development. Working on unity, understanding and mutual acceptance is key for me in life. 

"The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others'' (Mahatma Gandhi).

profile_positions.description:
The activities of the Global Head of Sales Tools & Solutions are part of the Global Sales Engagement Team under the umbrella of the Global Sales Efficiency Department with the main responsibility to support Global Sales and ENA (Europe & North Africa) Sales Teams by bringing centralized sales efficiency and by building a community mindset between HUB’s and Global, by building and providing efficient and effective sales technology and automated, self-service reporting tools, by defining and delivering harmonized sales processes, reporting solutions and B2B strategies, by spreading knowledge and best practices, clear and simple processes, by creating innovative solutions for the most efficient sales workflows and by providing audits, reports and dashboards to promote data quality as the most valuable asset and to drive our Sales Teams performance. We co design hand in hand with Business Owners and Sales Leaders.

Key words:
- Autonomy & Automation
- Simplifying & Targeting
- Forecasting & Pipelining

The Global Sales Team organization consists of the following 7 departments: Global Corporate Clients (including 4 Teams), Global TMC, GDS and Travel Agency Partners (including 3 Teams), Global M&E, Airlines & Trade Marketing (including 6 Teams), Global OTA & B2B Leisure Clients (including 4 Teams), Global Sales Projects & Client Tools (including 2 Teams), Global Sales Efficiency (including 4 Teams) and Sustainability.

The ENA (Europe & North Africa) Sales Team organization consists of 6 departments: Corporate & TMC (including 5 Teams), M&E and Leisure (including 4 Teams and 4 Sub Teams), Strategy & Transformation, Business Development & Sport (including 5 Teams), Hotel Sales Relation & Consulting (including 5 Teams), Sales Animation, Strategic Partners & International Sales (Inbound M&E) (including 2 Teams) and Connectivity, Sales Digitalisation & B2B Marketing (including 3 Teams).
profile_positions.title: Global Head of Sales Support Tools & Solutions

profile_positions.description:
The activities of the Head of Sales Support Tools & Solutions are part of the Sales Efficiency Department with the main responsibility to create solutions, offering simplified processes for an efficient sales workflow and manage the team of experts in charge of tools & solutions, supporting the whole sales teams of all segments within Northern Europe* with the contracting of their clients across the Accor hotels’ portfolio. The Head of Sales Support Tools & Solutions is working closely with all the Hub’s Sales’ Heads of Department to ensure their sales teams understand and follow the right process to achieve their goals, high level of data quality and an efficient reporting and acts as the direct relay of the Global Sales Support Teams in the Hub. 

*Northern Europe organization consists of 31 Countries - 1.138 Hotels - 161K Rooms 
Albania / Armenia / Austria / Azerbaijan / Belgium / Bosnia-Herzegovina / Bulgaria / Croatia /Czech Republic / Estonia / Georgia / Germany / Hungary / Ireland / Kazakhstan / Latvia / Lithuania / Luxembourg / Moldova / North Macedonia / Poland / Romania / Russia / Serbia / Slovakia / Slovenia / Sweden / Switzerland / The Netherlands / Ukraine / United Kingdom
profile_positions.title: Head of Sales Support Tools & Solutions Northern Europe

profile_positions.description:
Accor is a world-leading augmented hospitality group offering unique and meaningful experiences in almost 4,800 hotels, resorts, and residences across 100 countries. With an unrivalled portfolio of brands from luxury to economy, Accor has been providing hospitality savoir-faire for more than 50 years. Beyond accommodations, Accor enables new ways to live, work, and play with Food&Beverage, nightlife, wellbeing, and coworking brands. To drive business performance, Accor’s portfolio of business accelerators amplifies hospitality distribution, operations, and experiences. Guests have access to one of the world’s most attractive hotel loyalty programs. 

Accor is deeply committed to sustainable value creation, and plays an active role in giving back to planet and community. Planet 21 – Acting Here endeavours to act for “positive hospitality”, while Accor Solidarity, the endowment fund, empowers disadvantaged people through professional training and access to employment.

As the Accor BeNeLux Sales Team we want to be recognized as the reliable and best service provider, delivering proven added value to our Partners via creative and proactive solutions.

The BeNeLux Sales Support Team is responsible for the effective and efficient support, planning, coordinating, assigning, monitoring, administration and control of support services, activities and projects of and within the BeNeLux Sales Department. Our mission is to support the commercial department, partners & hotels on an effective and professional manner. We are a solution-oriented and reliable partner for our customers, partners and colleagues. Our vision: by supporting and connecting achieving the maximum yield for Accor.
profile_positions.title: Supervisor Sales Support BeNeLux

profile_positions.description:
The Sales Support Team (6#) is responsible for the effective & efficient support, planning, coordinating, assigning, monitoring & control of support services, activities & projects of the Sales & Distribution Department. Our mission is to support the commercial department & hotels on effective & professional manner. We are a solution-oriented and reliable partner for our customers & colleagues. Our vision: by supporting & connecting achieving the maximum yield for Accor.  

Duties & Responsibilities:
• Overseeing day-to-day functions of the Sales Support team.
• Planning, coordination, assigning, monitoring and control of support services, activities & projects.
• Directing, guiding, developing & evaluating the Sales Support Team.
• Central point of contact & liason for / between the Sales Support team, HOD's & field sales
• In close consultation with the National Sales Team, Marketing & hotel colleagues
• Coordination of activities & initiating possible actions for the Commercial Division.
• Contributing to a proactive support & believe in solutions with and / or recommendations.
• Provide coaching & identifying training to assist Sales Support in reaching objectives
• Acknowledge progress & address area of opportunity on a team & individual basis
• Supervise the actions to achieve daily & monthly objectives
• Maintain strong knowledge of products/practices required to lead & develop the team
• Participate in constant dialogue with Sales Support Manager & peers to share best practices 
• Initiating, developing, implementing, maintaining & optimizing necessary SOP's & manuals
• Maintain & update policies & procedures, audits, business continuity & risk assessment
• Provides guidance to sales representatives on products to meet customer needs.
• Provides expert knowledge of products & services to staff.

Training Leadership by Coaching by Q & Co.
Training Insights Discovery Profile by TA Collectief Training en Coaching
profile_positions.title: Supervisor Sales & Distribution Support The Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
Accor The Netherlands offers a broad portfolio of 38 hotels.

The Meetings & Events, Leisure and E-Distribution team (16 #) is responsible for attracting and retaining customers in the Meetings & Events and Leisure industry in the Netherlands. This includes for Meeting & Events: Business Intermediaries, Destination Management Companies, Seminar Planners, Professional Congress Organizers, Associations and Foundations, Training and Education market, Media & Entertainment business and Sports. For Leisure: Incoming and Outbound Tour Operators, Wholesalers and Destination Management Companies. For E-Distribution: Online Distribution Channels.

Duties and Responsibilities:
• Assuring focused & productive communication with clients, distributors & colleagues. 
• Responsible for different kinds of administrative functions essential for everyday operation.
• Providing sales and administrative support involving efficient handling of agreements. 
• Supporting the sales team in attaining sales targets.   
• Preparing monthly, weekly or daily sales analysis. 
• Preparing proposals, agreements, sales reports, and presentations. 
• Updating the status of sales order in the database. 
• Collecting, analyzing & accounting information to increase productivity of sales. 
• Conducting regular performance reviews to determine the success of sales strategies.
• Monitoring trends & evaluating the performance assessed against monthly sales goals. 
• Maintaining an efficient and effective work environment. 
• Coordinating fairs, events and sales processes.
• Planning, implementing & monitoring of projects & activity plan.
• Processing invoices and expense reports.
• Developing & implementing procedures for the department.
• Monitoring processes within the department.
• Supervision, guidance & assessment of 2 trainees.
• Assisting in the implementation of sales strategy as prepared by the Sales Director.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator Sales Meetings & Events, Leisure and E-Distribution (Web Indirect)
Coordinator Sales Meetings & Events and Leisure Sales

profile_positions.description:
Hilton has around 530 hotels and resorts in 76 countries across six continents with more than 189,000 rooms worldwide.

During my traineeship I have been active as an Assistant National Sales Coordinator within the Sales & Business Development Department of Hilton The Netherlands and as support of the Business Development Manager at Hilton Amsterdam Airport Schiphol hotel.

Certificate obtained: Telemarketing

http://www.hilton.com

profile_positions.description:
Pennyhill Park Luxury Hotel & Spa, England, UK, luxury country house hotel located between Ascot, Sunningdale and Wentworth and only 45 minutes from the centre of London. Offers everything from tennis, five-star spa breaks, treatments to its own golf course and the fine dining restaurant The Latymer with 1 Michelin Star and 4 AA Rosettes. Part of the Exclusive Hotel collection of luxury hotels in England.

During my traineeship I have been active as a Supervisor within the Conference & Banqueting Department, a service employee of restaurant and bar (Food & Beverage Department) and in the support of the Banqueting Manager. I have also worked on a Marketingplan including an analysis and recommendations for further hoteldevelopment.

http://www.pennyhillpark.co.uk
http://www.exclusivehotels.co.uk

Intercontinental Hotel Luxembourg, Luxembourg, 5 star hotel located 10 minutes from the city centre, Kirchberg financial area and airport. InterContinental Hotels & Resorts is located in major cities in over 60 countries worldwide and is a brand of IHG, an international hotel company with more than 650,000 rooms in over 4,500 hotels in over 100 countries.

During my traineeship I have been active in the Conference & Banqueting Department, Bar La Veranda, Cold Kitchen and Roomservice.
